_header: Saint Peter was with our Lord of all Apostles highest
Subjects: saints’ lives; Peter, saint, life of
_description: Life of St. Peter in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodAsh43.First Lines:
SEyn Peter was wiþ our lord of alle apostles hextSeynt Ion
                    þe ewangelist & he our lord were euer next…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…Seynt Peter þat bereþ heuene keie þoru our lordes
                    graceGraunte ous þuder come & þer Inne habbe an
                    place

Bod779.First Lines:
Seint petir was wiþ oure lord on of þe apostlus
                    hexte& seint Ihon þe ewangelist for euer þey were him
                    nexte…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…seint peter þat heuene keyis kepeþ þorwȝ
                    goddus gracegraunte vs þedir for to come & þer to habben a
                    place

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Seint peter was wiþ vr lord of alle hise apostles hextSeint
                    Ion Ewangelist mid ur lord weren tweyne next…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…ffor he þolede for him more and ȝaf him ensaumple
                    þertoÞerfore ne reccheþ þis goode mon þauh me him
                    do wo…
BodEngPoeta1.Note: Ends imperfectly due to missing folio 37.
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
SEint Petur was wiþ oure lord of alle his apostles hextSeint
                    Ion þe euangelist & he were oure lord next…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…Þei beoþ ȝette kept as relikes þorw holi
                    chirche loreÞe lasse seint peters were & seint poules þe
                    more
BodLauMis463.Note: Two columns per page, one full-line, the other half-line.

CULAdd3039.First Lines:
…Parte had þe devile envy as he has til al gudeA
                    disciple he made in lande þat was of lithir modeSymon magus was hys
                    name þat werrayd nyȝt & dayAgayne criste & his
                    seruanteȝ þat trowed in cristen lay…
CULAdd3039.Last Lines:
…Sayn petre þat bereȝ heuen key þou lavse vs out of
                    synne& brynge vs to þat mekil blis þat neuer more sal
                    blynne
CULAdd3039.Note: Begins imperfectly due to loss of folio(s).

CamCCC145.First Lines:
Seinte peter was wiþ oure louerd of al is apostles hecstSein
                    Ion þe wangelist & he were euere oure louerd nexst…
CamCCC145.Last Lines:
…Seinte peter þat heuene keie witeþ þoru godes
                    graceGrante us þuder forto come & þer Inne habbe a
                    place
CamCCC145.Editions:
D’Evelyn,  Charlotte,  and  A. J. Mill, eds.  
             The South English Legendary: Corpus Christi College Cambridge MS. 145
                and British Museum MS. Harley 2277, with variants from Bodley MS. Ashmole 43 and
                British Museum MS. Cotton Julius D.ix.
EETS
         o.s. 235 (1959), 236 (1956); repr. 1967: 1.246-64.

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Seint Peter was wiþ oure lord of alle þe Apostles
                    hextSeint Ion þe Ewangelist and he were oure lord euere
                    next…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…Seint Peter þat heuene keyes witeþ þorw oure lordes
                    graceVs helpe þuder to come and þer ynne habbe a
                    place

CamTCC605.First Lines:
SEint petir with oure lord of alle appostlis ys hext& seint Ion
                    þe euangeliste was euer oure lord next…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…peter þat beryt heuene key þorwe oure lordis
                    gracegraunte ous þyder to come & þer in habbe a
                    place

BLAdd10301.First Lines:
SEinte peter was wiþ oure lorde of alle is apostles hecstSein
                    Ion þe euangelist & he were euere oure lorde nexst…
BLAdd10301.Last Lines:
…Seinte peter þat heuene keye witeþ þoru godes
                    graceGraunte vs þuder for to come & þer Inne haue
                    aplace
BLAdd10301.Attributed Title:
De sancto petro apostolo (f. 107v, by scribe in margin
                    beside first line); Petrus (RT)

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: SEin peter was wit oure lord of alle þe apostol heikstsein Ion þe euangelist & he our lord were euer nekst…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …sein peter þat berit heuen keye vorou oure lordes gracegrante vs þeþer come & þer Inne an place
BLCottJulDIX.Note: “Capitulum xlvii” added to right margin by later hand (f. 92).
BLCottJulDIX.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of British Library  Cotton Julius MS D IX.
         https://www.bl.uk/manuscripts/FullDisplay.aspx?ref=Cotton_MS_Julius_D_IX.

BLEge1993.First Lines: Seint Petur wiþ oure lord was of al þe apostles bextSein Ion þe euangelist was euer oure lord next…
BLEge1993.Last Lines: …Peter þat bereþ heuene Reken þorw oure lordes graceGrante vs þider to come & þer inne habben a place

BLEge2810.First Lines: SEint petir was wiþ oure louird of alle is apostlis hexteSeint Iohn þe ewangeliste & he were euere oure louird nexte…
BLEge2810.Last Lines: …Seint petir þat witiþ heuene keie þorȝ godis graceGrante ous þudir to come to þulke vaire place

BLEge2891.First Lines: SEinte peter was wiþ oure louerd of al is apostles hextSein Ion þe wangelist and he were oure louerd next…
BLEge2891.Last Lines: …ffor seinte peter and sein poul riȝt non Imartred beoþffor mid hore beire soule nouþe to heuene fleoþ…
BLEge2891.Note: Ends incomplete due to missing folio or folios between 106 and 107.

BLHar2277.First Lines: SEint peter was wiþ oure louerd of alle his apostles hextSeint Iohn þe wangelist & he were oure louerd next…
BLHar2277.Last Lines: …Seint peter þat heuene kaye witeþ þurf godes graceGrante ous þat we to heuene come & þer habbe a place
BLHar2277.Facsimiles:

Lam223.First Lines:
SAynt Petre was with oure lord of þe Apostles hextSaynt Ion
                    þe euaungelist & he god here were next…
Lam223.Last Lines:
…His hede was dounward & all his body was pyned
                    þereÞeron he dyed as god hit wold his soule to heuen wentGod
                    for love of hem boþe oure synnes lete vs amende Amen

TokyoTak54.First Lines:
Seint Peter was wiþ our lord & of alle postels hexteSeint
                    Iohn þe euaungelest & he were euere our lord nexte…
TokyoTak54.Last Lines:
…Seynt Peter þat hevene keys berst wiþ our lordis
                    graceGraunte vs þidere to come and haue þer in a
                    place
